title: The Soldier's Guiding Paradox: 'Protect What You Love'
teaser: Writer Elliot Ackerman, former Marine officer and veteran of five deployments to Iraq and Afghanistan, explains what being a man means to him: It's protecting what you love.
contentencoded:
Writer Elliot Ackerman, former Marine officer and veteran of five deployments to Iraq and Afghanistan, explains what being a man means to him: It's protecting what you love. Unfortunately, that notion is often at odds with the job of a soldier.

Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
